Package sources

Class MovieCollection

java.lang.Object
sources.MovieCollection
public class MovieCollection extends Object
This class represents a collection of movies.

    • removeGreater

      public int removeGreater(Movie movie)
      Removes all movies with greater ratings than the given movie from the movieHashMap.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the number of movies removed

    • replaceIfLowe

      public boolean replaceIfLowe(Integer id, Movie movie)
      Replaces the movie with given id in the movieHashMap if its oscarCount is lower than the given movie's rating.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the movie to replace
      movie - the movie to replace with
      Returns:
      true if the movie was replaced, false otherwise

    • removeLowerKey

      public int removeLowerKey(Integer id)
      Removes all movies with ids less than the given id from the movieHashMap.
      Parameters:
      id - the id to compare
      Returns:
      the number of movies removed

    • printAscending

      public void printAscending()
      Prints the movies in the movie collection in ascending order of movie names.

    • printDescending

      public void printDescending()
      Prints the movies in the movie collection in descending order of movie names.

    • printFieldDescendingOscarsCount

      public void printFieldDescendingOscarsCount()
      Prints the movies in the movie collection in descending order of Oscars count. The output format is "Oscars count - Movie name".
